sub_title: Executive leader | Scale-ups | Growth driver | Board member
summary:
Seasoned General manager and Board member with deep experience in scaling consumer-Tech companies. 

Managing Director of the BU Fintech, Group Chief Marketing Officer and part of the Group Leadership Team (GLT) at PropertyGuru Group (NYSE: PGRU), Asia’s leading property technology company. Led the business to market-leadership across Southeast Asia and towards a successful public listing on the New York Stock Exchange (March 2022).

Over two decades of senior leadership experience across consumer-Tech (Marketplaces / Fintech), BtB-SAAS and CPG industries, in senior operational capacity (Strategy, Product, Marketing, Operations and general /P&L-management) and Board positions in Europe and Asia. Is a passionate driver of industry transformation, complex growth cases and building winning teams with mission-led companies.

Scale-up | Marketplaces | Fintech | consumer-Tech | CEO | COO | Managing Director
